participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Positive and optimistic, always looking forward to new experiences.
participant_1.background: I am eighteen years old. I just graduated high school with honors. I just bought my first car. I received a full scholarship to Florida State University.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Curious and introspective, enjoys exploring different ideas and perspectives.
participant_2.background: I have a rose tattooed on my right ankle. There are thorns tattooed on my toes. I only wear silver jewelry. I work in a doctor's office. I am studying to be a dental hygienist but I hate seeing patients' saliva.

content.text: Congratulations on graduating high school! I'm sure you're excited to start college.
Thank you! I am really excited. I'm also a little nervous, but I'm sure it'll be fine.
I'm sure it will be too. So, what are you planning on studying in college?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about either business or psychology.
Both of those are great choices. I'm sure you'll do great whatever you decide to do.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, write, and play video games. I also like to go out with my friends.
That sounds like fun. I like to do a lot of the same things. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and fantasy.
Me too! I love learning about new cultures and imaginary worlds.
I know, right? It's so much fun to be transported to another place.
So, what are you looking forward to in college?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people, learning new things, and having fun.
Me too! I'm sure it'll be a great experience.
